body.name: Mini Water Bottle 10.8oz/320ml Travel Coffee Mug with Handle Thermos for Hot and Cold Drinks Insulated Tumblers for Women Vacuum Sealed Flask Pink
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 27 mins
features: ❤【Keep Heat and Cold】Our small water bottles are made of high quality 304 stainless steel,BPA free,strong and durable,not easy to break and transfer flavor.Non-slip powder coating ensures your cup won't sweat,is comfortable to use,prevents scratches,and can be kept warm or refrigerated for more than 6 hours.

❤【Small and portable】Our thermos water bottle features a new lightweight design,capacity 320ml,size : 5.51in*2.95in(14 cm*7.5 cm),small and portable design,unique appearance and bright colors that you can easily fit into your purse,backpack,gym bag or carrying case.This mini thermos is perfect for everyone,making it the perfect gift for family and friends.

❤【Easy to clean and carry】Our thermos cup features a wide-mouthed design for easy thorough cleaning and a compact design that takes up minimal space while maximizing capacity.In addition,the travel coffee mug is ergonomically designed to make it more elegant to use without slipping out of the hand.What's more,the coffee thermos with high elastic silicone handle,more convenient for you to carry out.

❤【Leak-proof design】Our small water bottle lid with built-in sealed silicone ring,no matter how to tilt and shake,the liquid inside the bottle will not leak,to ensure sealing and anti-leakage,don't worry about water,juice,coffee,tea wet your backpack.You only need to gently open the lid counterclockwise to drink the liquid in the cup,anytime and anywhere for you to replenish water,improve your quality of life.

❤【Healthy life and after-sales service】It is our responsibility to protect the earth.Our insulated water bottle not only use environmentally friendly materials,but also bring you a healthy lifestyle.Let's say goodbye to traditional plastic cups,fragile cups and disposable cups!If you like our coffee cup,we will be very grateful;If you have any questions,please leave us a message and we will get back to you as soon as possible!
body.description: Why choose our travel mug? Overall characteristics and advantages: ✔Warm or refrigerate for 6 to 12 hours. ✔Capacity 320 ml,light weight,easy to carry. ✔Silicone handle design,feel comfortable,100% leakproof. ✔Stainless steel double wall vacuum bottle. ✔Wide mouth for easy cleaning. ✔Threaded mouth,smooth and round,screwed smoothly,drinking water will not hurt the mouth. ✔The bottom of the cup is non-slip,wear-resistant, non-slip,stable placement. Product specifications: Material :304 stainless steel Size :5.51in*2.95in(14 cm*7.5 cm) Capacity: 10.8oz / 320ml Packaging includes :1X mini thermos Note: ➤Clean the body with a neutral detergent and use a soft cleaning appliance such as a cup brush or sponge before use. ➤When using, add hot water or ice water first for preheating or precooling to achieve better insulation effect. ➤Tighten the cork in a clockwise direction to prevent leakage. ➤Do not fill carbonated drinks or dry ice, in order to avoid excessive pressure in the drinks or bottles and leakage. ➤Do not heat or freeze this product in microwave oven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love it !!! This is a very nice cup it keeps the water or whatever beverage very cold. I haven’t put anything hot in it yet. It fits perfectly in my purse. I’m so glad I ordered this thermos cup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for my adult needs!
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a cooler bottle so I could take milk to work for breakfast. This fits the bill perfectly! It’s a great size for a “glass” of milk. It cleans easily and it does keep milk cold for a while! Bottle is also leakproof so far. I haven’t had any issues

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps hot for hours!
reviews.reviewText: I haven’t used it to keep anything cold, so I cannot comment on that.It is leakproof and I can throw it in my handbag and not have to worry about it spilling out. I am ordering more for Christmas giftsGreat find!
